name: pure-function-testing
description: Testing - Intro to testing, Types of testing, Vitest for unit testing. Keywords - Testing, Unit Testing, Vitest, Import, Node Modules, NPM. Basics of testing - Testing is in charge of making our apps production ready. - Environments - Development --> Environment, Writing code, features and programming. - Other environments - Production --> The users final version of the product. - Testing QA - Team will perform tests in the app to find errors, bugs, optimisation issues. - Different types of tests - Unit testing - Performing tests for specific code blocks/(Integration testing and end-to-end testing - are more for larger apps for larger building blocks) -
